item.title: Report X-2025040479
item.description:
Report X-2025040479

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-07T21:14:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-03
  • City: Chattanooga
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment was discovered by the courier. It was suspected to contain undeclared DG per the Packing List. No Release. Inner contents: 11 Dewalt XR Batteries 6 batteries (part#DCB205-2) 20v/5Ah 3 batteries (part#DCB2108-2)20v/8Ah 2 batteries (Model DCK2050M2) 20v/4Ah The shipment is being held for FAA investigation.

item.title: Report X-2025040465
item.description:
Report X-2025040465

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-07T21:14:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-02
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 2nd a package was discovered at the Memphis Hub that was not declared as DG. The package contained UN3480 Lithium ion batteries, 9, There were no markings or labels on the outside that it contained lithium batteries/. The battery was discovered during a customs inspection. The package is being held pending investigation.

item.title: Report E-2025040169
item.description:
Report E-2025040169

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-07
  • City: ARLINGTON
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 7, 2025, two (2) 3.5-gallon pails of printing ink were punctured and released approximately seven (7) gallons of product to the trailer interior and pavement beneath. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Mid-South Environmental Services (MSES) to remediate the site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the site. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum. The damaged pails were placed in one (1) additional 55-gallon drum.

item.title: Report E-2025040173
item.description:
Report E-2025040173

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-07
  • City: ANTIOCH
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R & L CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On April 7, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of Cola Zoline T was damaged and released approximately five (5) gallons of product to the trailer interior and dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from TPM Group (TPM) to remediate the impacted site. The crew utilized absorbents and hand tools to remediate the site. All impacted materials were containerized in one (1) 55-gallon drum and the damaged drum was placed in one (1) 85-gallon overpack for disposal.

item.title: Report X-2025040464
item.description:
Report X-2025040464

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-06T01:06:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-02
  • City: MEMPHIS
  • State: TN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS AVIATION SERVICES, INCORPORATED
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: While loading a pallet at the MEMH location a wooden skid with eleven plastic jerrycans had signs of a release. While investigating the shipment the spill agent observed that one of the jerrycans was punctured on the bottom by a nail from the wooden skid. The damaged jerrycan was placed in to a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.

  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During sort operations a fiberboard box was crushed by a dolly at the MEMH location. The fiberboard box contained two metal jerrycans in plastic bags. One can was damaged by the dolly spilling the contents. The shipment was placed into a steel salvage package and a new declaration will be obtained for movement.
